settings.text: Our products represent both your journey into sustainability and your journey into your own sense of style, and we want to ensure that you are completely satisfied with your purchase. As part of our Greenlight Customer Satisfaction Program, we offer a 100% satisfaction guarantee and generous warranty coverage.

settings.title: 14-Day Return or Exchange: All Products
settings.text: In the event you are unhappy or ordered an item in error, please contact us within 14 days of delivery for a refund or exchange.*

settings.title: 60-Day Product Warranty: Cases
settings.text: In the event there is a product defect beyond the 14-Day Return or Exchange window, we will provide a free replacement.*

settings.title: 1-Year Product Warranty: Chargers & Cables
settings.text: In the event there is a product defect beyond the 14-Day Return or Exchange window, we will provide a free replacement.*
Use this text to share information about your store with your customers. Describe products, share announcements, or welcome customers to your store.

settings.title: 14-Day Return or Exchange
settings.answer:
- Available within 14 days of order delivery, verified via the tracking link

- Eligible only for products and orders placed directly through ecoblvd.com

- Note: Customized products returned for any reason other than EcoBlvd error/defect are subject to a 50% restocking fee. Please double-check your customizations before submitting your order to minimize receiving an undesired design(s).

settings.title: 60-Day Product Warranty: Cases
settings.answer:
- Eligible for all EcoBlvd phone cases*

- Available within 60-days of purchase

- One-time replacement or exchange offered of equal or lesser value

- Note: Refunds are not provided beyond the 14-Day delivery date

*Product defects do not include customized design errors. If there is a design error with a custom case, please contact us within 14 days of delivery for a resolution.

settings.title: 1-Year Product Warranty: Chargers & Cables
settings.answer:
- Eligible for all EcoBlvd chargers and cables

- Available within 12 months of purchase

- One-time replacement or exchange offered of equal or lesser value

- Note: Refunds are not provided beyond the 14-Day delivery date

settings.title: Every single product at EcoBlvd has a dedication to "Be Part of the Solution. Not the Pollution".
settings.text:
Our goal is to resolve all warranties without causing more waste by having customers send back defective or damaged products. If there is a problem with the product, we will replace it and send you a new one at no cost!

Feel free to send us some photos of what happened so we can improve our products further!

NOTE: In some instances, we may require the product to be sent back; if so, we will provide a free shipping label.Â
We may require additional information from you, so please make sure to check your junk/spam folders for our response.

settings.contact_title: Need to file a claim? Get in touch with us.
